scripts.static-node: npm-run-all static-node-bootstrap static-node-popperjs static-node-bootstrap-icons static-node-forkawesome-icons static-node-fontsource
scripts.static-node-bootstrap: shx mkdir -p dist/js && shx cp -r node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js dist/js/bootstrap.min.js && shx cp -r node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js.map dist/js/bootstrap.min.js.map
scripts.static-node-popperjs: shx mkdir -p dist/js && shx cp -r node_modules/@popperjs/core/dist/umd/popper.min.js dist/js/popper.min.js && shx cp -r node_modules/@popperjs/core/dist/umd/popper.min.js.map dist/js/popper.min.js.map
scripts.static-node-bootstrap-icons: shx mkdir -p dist/icons/bootstrap-icons && shx cp -r node_modules/bootstrap-icons/font/. dist/icons/bootstrap-icons
scripts.static-node-forkawesome-icons: shx mkdir -p dist/icons/forkawesome && shx cp -r node_modules/fork-awesome/. dist/icons/forkawesome
scripts.static-node-fontsource: shx mkdir -p dist/css/files && shx cp -r node_modules/@fontsource/bebas-neue/files/. dist/css/files && shx cp -r node_modules/@fontsource/source-code-pro/files/. dist/css/files
scripts.css: shx mkdir -p dist/css && npm-run-all css-compile css-prefix css-minify
